dialog: I just happened to be gliding by...
I could have caught some food on my way to the store, but...
Anyway, get me a salmon roll please. And a bowl of rice.
Man, the store isn’t gonna be open all day, you know.
Alright, I’ve got a nest that really needs some repairs.
I’m going to the store before it closes.
Good to see you two again.
Thought I’d come by during my lunch break.
This place been treating you well?
Well, we still miss you back at corporate.
Since that poke bowl was pretty good on Monday,
I’ll be late to my meeting.
You know how the Boss from HQ is.
Just as I expected from you two.
Sorry, I have to go now.
You know how the Boss is.
My mom gave me extra allowance this week!
I’m gonna spend it on an action figure!!
But I’m gonna spend food money on lunch.
Can I try the sashimi this time?
I think I’ll just head home and see if my mom is making an early dinner...
My echolocation told me you were serving food here at the park.
I’ll take two orders of sashimi and one salmon roll.
I can hear the chef moving slowly...
I can barely hear them moving...
You practically slowed down to a dead halt!
I’m gonna go find some live food!
I’d like three orders of salmon rolls.
Does chopping things really take this long?
better luck with that chopping tomorrow.
